template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Triage incoming tickets, auto-fix common issues, escalate complex cases to engineers, and track resolution metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt under 40 words for a customer support automation workflow. Let me break down the requirements: it needs to cover triage, automatic resolution, escalation, and performance tracking for a managed hosting provider.

I should start by identifying the key components: triage to categorize issues, auto-fix for simple problems, escalation for complex cases, and analytics for tracking. The challenge is fitting all that into one sentence under 40 words.

Maybe structure it as a flow: triage incoming tickets, resolve common ones automatically, escalate others, and monitor the system’s performance. That covers all points without extra details. Let me check the word count—yes, this should fit.
